data.name: Obscurant Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Obscurant Original Soundtrack by composer Brian McCarthy features an hour's worth of epic guitar-centric music with electronic and orchestral influences.

Relive your favorite moments from the game as you experience the music that brought Obscurant to life.
data.about_the_game:
The Obscurant Original Soundtrack by composer Brian McCarthy features an hour's worth of epic guitar-centric music with electronic and orchestral influences.

Relive your favorite moments from the game as you experience the music that brought Obscurant to life.
data.short_description: Experience the epic soundtrack by composer Brian McCarthy that helped bring the world of Obscurant to life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 129 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 334 MB available space
